artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
kyo_ka:Palanquin bearers are rushing across the O_i River so fast that they even don\'t pay attention to famous beauties working in inns of Mariko station.
Japanese:O_i-gawa watari isogeba yado no na no imo kashimata no me nimo tomarazu
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Shimada
